div.p: Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxj die Julij

The saide day the aldirman and ballieis assignit tuysday that next cumis
to cristiane malisone to ansuer to Jonhne Kintor for the wranguis'
haldin fra him of ane Jak pertening to him of ayrschip and Jonhne
malisone come Souerte be his hand to entir hir the saide day

div.head: Nomina ad Inquisicionem mariorie chamer
div.p:
Dominus Johannes ruthirfurd Robertus blinsel Alexander Rede Dauid mathesone
Andreas branche Willelmus blinsel Andreas murray senior Johannes Retre Robertus
Crag Willelmus andirsone senior Ricardus hill Junior Willelmus nicholsone Johannes
malisone Johannes lindoris et Willelmus murray Jurati dicunt quod quondam Elizi
beth' Srathachin filia sororis mariote chamer latricis presencium obiit vltimo
vestita et sasita ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis
de dimidietate cuiusdam terre sine tenementj Jacentis infra dictum burgum
in vico furcarum ex occidentali parte eiusdem ter vici inter terram Robertj murray ex
australi ex vna et terram patricij adamsone ex boreali partibus ab altera et
communionem viam regiam versus oriens et lacum dicti burgi versus occidens
Et quod dicta mariota est legittima et propinquior heres dicte quondam Elizi
beth' de dicte dimidietate terre cum pertinenciis Et quod est legittime etatis Et
quod valet per annuj decem s' et tantum valuit tempore pacis Et quod
tenetur in capite de Suppremo domino nostro Rege per seruicium
burgagium Et nunc existit in manibus domini nostri Regis per
Spacium vnius annuj in defectu veri heredis Jus suum minime
prosequentis datum et clausum et cetera
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxvj die Julij anno quo supra

The saide day effy adamsone was in ane amerciament of the court for
the wranguis' takin of ane blancat out of Dauid clubis
hous and to amend as law will and forber' in tym to Cum

The saide day the balyeis assignit friday that next cumis to Jonhne
malisone to bring cristiane malisone befor tham to ansuer' to the
borghe' strekit one hir be Jonhne Kintor for the wranguis'
haldin fra him of ane Jak Ande gif he presentis hir' nocht
to ansuer' perempturlie to the saide Jonhne for the said Jak becaus'
he come Souerte for hir' entreys'

The said day Wllyam blinsell and vthir procuratouris to anne stirueling
producit ane autoritiwe Instrumente the subscripcioun' and Signe ma
nuale of mastir William strathachin notar public' and the Sele of tho
mas leslie balye of ane' land' liand in vuirkikget betuex the
land of Wlyam Ranisone one the Eest part And the land of Wlyam
buchan and Wllyam spens one the West part quhilkis being reid
the said procuratouris Requerit the aldirman and belyes to caus' alexander liell
to reid the said Inland And be caus' the said alexander allegit he haid
Richt to the said s land the aldirman and balyes with awis' of the
consel assignit friday that next cumis the antepennult day of this montht
of Julij Instant to the alexander to compir befor the aldirman and br belyeis'
within the tolbwuth thir' to bring with him his Richttis as he vell
tyne and wyne with perempturle but langar delay quhilkis he vel
vys' And falyeing tharof to reid the land but ony Impediment

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxix die
mensis Julij anno quo Supra

The saide day William blinsele procuratour to Namy Stirueling
requirit Reuerentlie as efferis the Aldirman ande bailyheis to ask
Alexander liell to produce ande schew his richtis quhilkis he had to Remane'
within the lande pertening to the saide domicell liand' within this burgh'
in the vthirkirkgat as day assignit to him peremptourlie eftir the tenour
of the act maide obefor Ande the saide Alexander allegit he and his wyf
aucht to Remane ande bide in the hous' ande placez that he
occupeit at this tyme for ane yer' Ande restorit that poynt
to the aithis of thomas leslie bailye and sere Jonhne' stirueling
and sere Androw henrisone Ande the saide procurator askit his resone be
schewin or ellis the saide lande be Rede quhilkis the saide
Alexander denyit to Red Ande in continent the saide action' was put
to the decision' of ane assis' of thir personis vndirwritin witht
consent of batht the saide partiis sere Jonhne' ruthirfurde Alexander Red
Jonhne' of Cullane Jonhne colisone thomas prat' Dauid
mathesone Androw branche James colisone Alexander mar William
Kintorr and William andirsone eldar quhilkis riplie auisit the
Resonis Richtis and allegacionis of batht the saide partiis
herd seyne and vndirstandin deliuerit be the moutht of
Alexander Red forspekar of the saide assis' that the said Alexander aw
to Red and deuoid the said lande in continent and gif the keis
fra him to the saide domicell or the officiaris of the tone'

The saide day the counsall and communite gatherit for the tyme
lauchfullie warning passing obefor be the premunicion of the hand'
bell and circualie Inquerit be philp of Dunbrek officiar' grantit
the bill' of the last taxt extentitdit for the viij Inglismen direkit to
the tone pertening to the duk of york be our Soueran lord' be Renovit
writin agane and Rasit to thar clething' provision' and furnising et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene in tenta In pretorio eiusdem secundo die
mensis Augusti anno quo Supra

The saide day thomas Riddaile was accusit be the bailyheis be
wertew of thar office for strublance of the haile tovne vndir cilence of
nicht quhilkis the saide thomas denyit and in continent the saide action' was
put to the decision' of ane assis' with his consent quhilkis gret aitht suorne'
the allegacionis and resonis suorne herd and vndirstandin deliuerit and furthtgefin
be the moutht of Robert blinsele forspekar of the saide assis' that thai cuth
nocht acquit the saide thomas of the saide strublance for the quhilkis
he was in amerciament of the court and to amende as law wile and forber in tyme
tocum

The saide day thomas Riddaile complenyeit to the bailyheis apone'
sere Jonhne stirueling that he wrangvislie strublis him Ande becaus'
the saide sire Jonhne' was in ane fensit court and wald nocht dissobey
our Souerane lordis officiaris denyit the saide strublance
with protestacion it suld nocht turne' him to preiudice anent the preuilege
of his Juge ordiner et cetera ande Jurisdiction' of haly kirk Ande
in continent the saide action' was put to the decision' of ane
assis' quhilkis riplie auisit the resonis and allegacionis of bath
the saide partiis herd witnes and preuis led fande and deliuerit be the
moutht of the saide Robertis blinsele forspekar of the saide assis'
the saide sere Jonhne' quyt and free of ale strublance

The saide day the bailyheis accusit thomas Riddaile for the
wrangwis' strublance of sere Jonhne' stirueling vndir cilence
of nicht and throcht forsoicht fellone' and hame' suking quhilkis the
saide thomas denyit and in continent the saide action' was put
to the decision of ane assis' quhilkis riplie auisit the richtis
ande resonis witnes and preues herd led and vndirstandin deliuerit
ande furthtgeff be the moutht of the saide Robert blinsele that
thai cuth nocht acquyt the saide thomas of the strublance of the
saide sere Jonhne for the quhilkis he was in amerciament of the Court
and to amende as ll law will and forber in tyme tocum

The said' day the borghe strekit be Jonhne of Kintor apone
cristian' malison' for the wranguis' haldin fra him of ane
Jak was fundin of vale be ane assis' Alexander Rede forspekar
for the quhilkis scho was in ane amerciament of the court and ordanit to deliuer
the said' Jak to the said' Jonhne quhilkis the balyeis ordanit hir'
to deliuer within terme of law

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem quinto die mensis
augusti quo Supra

Eodem die Robertus blinsell deuenit plegius legalis quod Johannes
meldrum Johannes andirsone et andreas Watsone erunt Indempnes
pro Andrea hay Johanne makreoche et Roberto moresone aliter quam per
viam Juris Et thomas prat deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus
Andreas Johannes et robertus erunt Indempnes pro dictis Johanne
Johanne et Andrea aliter quam per viam Juris Et quilibet dictarum parcium
obligatur ad releuandum suos plegios et cetera Instrumentum dictus Robertus blinsel obligatur
ad Intrandum dictos Johannem Johannem et Andream coram preposito et ballivis
infra premunicionem octo dierum postquam redierint a guerra et gilbertus
hay obligavit se ad releuandum predictum Robertum de huiusmodi plegio et cetera

Eodem die effamia alansone amerciatur per assisam ex ore thome prat
prelocutoris assise pro perturbio mariote turing et elizibeth' sclatar
quibus emendabit ut Jura volunt et cetera

Eodem die mariota Kennartj amerciatur pro perturbio mariote turing Cuj
emendabit ut Jura volunt per assisam ut supra

The saide day the aldirman and part of the Counsal present for the
tyme assignit to sere Robert Waus sere Jonhne Srathachin
and Robert huchonsone xxiiij markis of the maile of ane nethis
one the wattir of Done for this yer' tharof x li' to the saide sere
Robert iiij li' to the saide sere Jonhne and xl s' to the said Robert
for divine seruice continuale to be done as efferis conductiue sangastaris
within the kirk of Abirdene And the aldirman assignit to tham
Jonhne Wormetis Androw Culan eldar and gilbert menyes nethis
maile to be pait to thame and rasit at thar avne handis at
the termes vsual within the burghe'
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem octauo die Augusti

The saide day J Thomas litilJonhne grantit him avand to Johne
andirsone xxx s' quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay within terme
of law
Curia balliuorum de abirdene ixo die mensis Augusti quo Supra

the saide day Robert Walcar' on the Skulhill was in ane
amerciament of the court be ane assis' Alexander rede forspekar for the wrang
uis' Stoppin and avay puting of the wattir fra Sanct Jonhnis
place for the quhilkis he sal pay v s' to the mending of the spoutis
Ande gif he or Robert Walcar' or thomas Walcar' committis
sic traspas' in tymes to Cum or ony vthir of thar' craft sal pay
xl s' to the reformacion of the said' Sput vnforgevin

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
xij die Augusti quo Supra

Eodem die Alexander malisone amerciatur per Juratam assisam ex ore
Willelmj blinsel prelocutoris assise pro perturbio Alexandri Rede Cuj emenda
bit ut Jura volunt

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' that
Williame of Kintor sal deliuer to James Kintor ane almary
quhilk he hed' of his als' gude as quhen he Intromettit with It

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xix die
Augusti anno quo Supra

The saide day Alexander malisone et eduard' top oblist thame
be the fathtis of thar bodiis to stand' and abid at ane
decret arbitall gevin be Duncan Colisone Jonhne Retre
Robert Culane et george bysset anent vijxx and x li' hemp
flemis and xxxvij s' g' et cetera eftir the tenor' of the Samyn

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
vicesimo secundo die mensis Augustj Anno quo supra

The saide day William gareauche producit thir witnes
vndir writtin to depone the awaile of xxj barrelis of as'
debatable' betuix him and patrik leslie eftir the tenour of the
act maide tharapone obefor'

Jonhne litstar deponit be his aitht he hard say that the mane
bocht the as' fra patrik leslie for vj s' and viij d' the barell

Dauide galychtlie concordis in his deposicion' with the saide
Jonhne

Androue litstar deponit be his aitht he was beside
quhene he saw the as' bocht fra patrik leslie for vj s'
and viij d' the barell' ande gef him tua franche crovnis
In pament

The saide day patrik leslie protestit that the saide previs
producit in the saide action' suld turne' him to na preiudice
and aucht nocht to pas' for sindrie causis he had to schaw
and becaus' ane of the saide previs had gevin consall
in the saide mater and was partiale to him in the saide action'

The saide day the bailyheis assignit friday that next
cumis to oppin the saide deposicionis and to minister Justice
in the saide mater

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxvj die Augusti
quo Supra

The saide day the Court wardit Schew for law and It
was gevin for dome that Williame gareauche eldar'
hede preuit Sufficientlie that the barrell of ays' was
Sauld' be patrik leslie for vj s' and viij d' pertening to Jonhne
blabir' et cetera

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem pennultimo
die mensis augusti quo Supra

The saide day mathow branche complenyeit to the aldirman and balyeis
that he was strubulit wranguislie be Androw fyf besekand' tham
for remeid' of law Ande thomas leslie and Androw Cullan balyeis
said' effectuoslie thai suld' attache him and tak Souerte of him
to entir one friday to vndirlie the law that next cumis and thai coud'
comprehend' him and the said' mathow offerit redy to vndirlie the law

The saide day the balye Androw Culane schew to villiame
gareauche that he suld' avis' with the Counsale one friday
that next cumis anent the matir debatabile betuix him and patrik
leslie

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem secundo
die mensis Septembris anno quo Supra

The saide day Robert masone was conuictit be ane suorne
assis' sere Robert Jonhne ruthirfurd' forspekar' for the wranguis'
avay passing fra Sanct Nicholes werk and for al pontis contenit
in the writ producit be the mastir of the werke ffor the quhilkis
the said' Robert oblist him be his hande landis and gudis to
the aldirman and the consall to Entir to the said' werk in continent
ande to Remane at the samyn continualie and to amend' ale the faltis
bigane be sicht of the consale and the mastir of the werke et cetera
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem ix die septembris

The saide day Alexander menyeis Robert blinsele Jonhne Cullane Alexander
rede thomas prat gilbert menyeis Androw Cullan yongar Dauid matheson'
Alexander gray and Williame futhes was chosin and Suorne the greite
aithez be the consal and communite warnit and gathreit be premunicion
of the hand' bell throw the haill tone tile extent jc li' ymang
the haile tone to be gevin in ane propin tile our Souerane lordis
hienes for his gude grace of licence gevin to vs to Reman at hame
fra the passage in Ingland' In fortifeing and Supleing of the prince of
Ingland' Richard' Duk of york

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xij die
Septembris quo Supra

The saide day the balyeis assignit monunday that next cumis to
patrik leslie to ansuer to the borghe' strekit one him be thomas
hay for the wranguis' haldin fra him of xij s' of the fracht'
of one yopingask pipe

Eodem die philippus clerk conuictus per assisam Juratam ex ore
gilberti menyeis prelocutoris assise pro Inobediencia thome leslie balliuj
Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt
